posts.body: Doom Sourceports with DooM RougeLike Arsenal with Back To Saturn X.  I gotta admit, the assembled weapons have been hilariously fun.

If there's no update soon, I will finish my dungeon and events and post it here.  Afterwards it's the tournament.  I do have a question about that...  Are the Fighting Game Tournaments really bad now?  With the way people were describing them, they almost sound like the the AGDQ games with all the trannies and dilation all over the place.  If anyone has some hilarious and disturbing stories to share I'm all for it.  If there's nothing, then I think I will make the event about the AGDQ instead.
Unrelated to the question I have, there's something else I have to ask:  How will Alto be handled, and how will Anon's group encounter her?  Has that been decided?  **Because I do want to see Alto mouth off to Teagan so Anon will punch Alto's lights out.**

I figure after I finish my contributions to Anon's Bizarre Adventure, I think I'll work on a RPG Maker game with /monster/ as the theme.  Better to take it slow and have an idea on the overall theme, but it shouldn't be overly complicated, but still fun.  I hope that others can contribute.  I should make the engine MV so that git is more compatible with it if I plan to start it though.

Here's some sprites I did for ABA.  I tried to keep them small to keep in line with the other sprites, but it's difficult with all the little details she has.  And yes, she's wearing a loose white shirt.
My TOR browser works on the PC for the bunker, but it's giving me hell with my laptop.  How can I get TOR Browser to load the bunker on there?  It's giving me it can't connect error page.

Is everything good here?  I also noticed that my images now upload, but not 'fully'.  The images do make links and thumbnails, but the actual image is not in the src.  I have to rename it to seed it.

EDIT: Looks like the new Millchan update actually got around this.  Excellent.

>>591eb58b-4126-4adf-90ad-cd4419cdc517
Was this an update I'm not aware of?  I haven't watched the stream if it was part of that reveal.
Also, I got 4 primarch summons and Metatron.  I feel pretty damn good despite the lack of new characters.

>Which game is the best?
Personal or series overall?  If series overall, Nocturne, but I'm partial to SMT1.  I still have to play the Majin Tensei and Last Bible series though.
>Which is the worst?
Majin Tensei Ronde was an absolute disaster.
I know people have complained about SMTIV:Final alot, but Ronde is a special case of awful.
>Which friend did you feel the worst about having to kill?
Both Toshiki and Tetsuo in any of the routes, since they actually helped you out throughout the adventure even when they left you for various reasons **Whether Toshiki sacrifices himself to protect you, and Tetsuo breaks you out of prison**
>Which demon would you want to fuck?
Sedna, because large monoeye girls need loving.
>How much weirder does guro vore get when you're being eaten by tits?
Extremely.

Also, someone has been having fun exporting models.

I just realized, should I start a new Monoeyes thread because of the Spampocalypse?  /v/ and /pol/ mentioned that any newcomers that arrive will not be able to see the threads that were made anonymously.

>>7c38f022-9602-4d23-af8d-c37541af03d9
>>98b659ac-78ae-4c70-9099-f7c9854ab8b3
I also told them I was on that board and I'm going to keep this place as home for now.  When I get free time, I'll keep contributing, and I can browse safely whenever.  It's unfortunate that they don't want to come here, and I know the reasons are perfectly just, but I hate how splintered we are.  Doesn't help that we're splintered in several ways.

Still I guess we can come up with the splintered mascots across monster, maybe extend the pantheon?  **this is totally not an excuse for me to make monoeyes the bunker mascot, not at all!**

>>111cddb4-293c-4dde-af63-6f5760f35f63
Vox Day is Fed/Intel?  Where's the proofs?

I figure I'll update this thread in regards to some things I have discovered and posted on the vch board:  In regards to Miriam's ability to double and triple cast individual spells, that's not happening since I don't know how to code that and there's no actual solution online about casting a few different spells at once.  However, the Active Chain Skills plugin will get around this!

Finally managed to learn how chain spells operate since yanfly didn't do a good job explaining how that shit works. However I could only see 3 skills active, I figure I can make two types for her case with the different elemental spells.
To make chain skills, you have to set the skill as the chain starter (CHAIN SPELL), and assign the spells to it. There is no combo skills, only chain enders, and a chain ender will have no list of chain skills in the description.

Chain Spell

<chain skill L: 52>
<chain skill R: 56>
<chain skill X: 60>
<chain skill Y: 69>
<chain skill Z: 71>

Those are Fire II, Ice II, Thunder II, Saint, and Dark. But if you leave it at that, that's only one spell you can cast out of the three. What you do next is head over to the spell that's chainable, and add it's own list in the description.

Fire II
<chain skill>
<chain skill L: 54>
<chain skill R: 56>
<chain skill X: 60>
<chain skill Y: 69>
<chain skill Z: 71>

Two things to notice: The fire II spell now has chain skill, notifying that the skill can be used for chains. If it doesn't have that label, chain spell will not work! make sure you label any skills that you want to chain with chain skill. 2nd, look at chain skill L, the ID is 54, which is the AOE spell flame II. The spell has now lifted upward, but the rest stay the same. Right now flame II will end the chain since there's no chain list, but adding spells to that will extend the chain further. Funny thing, you can technically change the skill chains all completely, the list above can change all of the single target spells into their AOE variants instead, or you can restrict the selection with various branches. It's some rather powerful stuff.
I'm going to have to tone down Miriam's buff for this. For her to chain spell, she needs to use Intense Focus, but I set the MAT to +300%, which might be overkill with chain spell. I'll reduce that, but make a buffed version of her eye blast skill. The only other thing I need to figure out is how to set the status effect of magic burnout after magic focus dies out.

Then I learned how to add new status ailments after an old status ailment has ended its turn, this will work for Miriam's magic burnout after her magic focus buff wears off.
